Good ! I am
.timothy.schletter

I always seemed to be curious about how things are created. Working at the crossroads of design and front end development, I find myself rich with opportunities to explore, understand and improve the visual implementation of a digital experience. I work closely with business, design and development teams to support product UX/UI, front end development and integration. I have 6+ years experience doing this on Adobe Experience Manager. I hold a strong understanding of how a brand’s visual styles can be translated into a scalable and adaptive presentation framework (SCSS/CSS) with modular style scope and the use of BEM methodology — I tend to do my most effective designing in-browser. With AEM’s style system, I develop multi-product style and theme strategies that support the business and AEM authoring needs. Take a look at my LinkedIn to see my experience, which includes @10 years designing and building web applications for B2B, data & analytics, and digital marketing across teams and global businesses.

I have contributed to PBS's World World as storyboard artist, composer and music supervisor. I have also created music and audio for mobile games, apps, and video production — and I create music for play!
